dublinCore.dc:title: 115 HR 3993 IH: American Samoa Investment Act of 2017
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mrs. Radewagen (for herself, Miss González-Colón of Puerto Rico, and Mr. Sablan) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to include United States nationals among the eligible employees of an EB–5 commercial enterprise, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the American Samoa Investment Act of 2017.

section.header: Inclusion of United States nationals as eligible employees
section.text: Section 203(b)(5)(A)(ii) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1153(b)(5)(A)(ii)) is amended by inserting after not fewer than 10 United States citizens the following: , United States nationals,.
